price: I kovali su spletke, ali smo i Mi kovali spletke a da to oni i ne naslutiše.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
